summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.5°C) and outside temperature (down 5.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1487 m), feels like temperature (up 8.4°C), outside temperature (up 6.9°C), and dew point temperature (up 3.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 533.2m lower than yesterday, 506.2m lower than the past week, 1486.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1191.0m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1697.2m and 2680m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; chilly temperatures are forecasted. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry. Showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dark. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
